thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo 'expecting twins with surrogate who is due very soon'
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo 'expecting twins with surrogate who is due very soon'

title: Cristiano Ronaldo 'expecting twins with surrogate who is due very soon'
text:
Published 12th March 2017 
He is believed to have used an American surrogate who is due "very soon". 
A source said: "Cristiano and his family can’t wait to meet the new members of their clan. 
"He likes to keep a tight lid on his private life but has told loved ones and close friends the baby boys are due to arrive very soon. 
INSTAGRAM CLOSE BOND: Cristiano is already a father to 7-year-old Cristiano Cristiano Ronaldo’s new girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez Monday, 9th January 2017 CRISTIANO RONALDO showed off his incredible new girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez at tonight's FIFA awards. 1 / 14 GETTY 
"He feels the time is right for his boy to have brothers to grow up with. His mum Dolores will be there to lend a helping hand like she has been with little Cristiano," they told The Sun. 
They claim that a source told them Cristiano will fly the twins to his mansion in Spain once they are born. 
The identity of the mother has been kept secret. 
REX FEATURES HAPPY FAMILY: Cristiano will be adding another two babies to the family Cristiano Ronaldo's many girlfriends Monday, 19th September 2016 Cristiano Ronaldo is undeniably one of the more polished footballers off the field, so here's a look at all the ladies he's rumoured to have dated. 1 / 25
